english.segment1: "man is sometimes extraordinarily, passionately, in love with suffering and that is a fact.". -fyodor dostoyevsky
english.segment2: so long. i guess it's so long. i can feel this now. my time. yes it's my time. do you want me now
english.segment3: oh well. you never could tell. 'cause you don't know how. you saved me. then you dragged me. all the way to hell
english.segment4: all the times you said. you'd be better off if i were dead. you know you could have walked away. could have walked away
english.segment5: over. guess it's over. and now you're the one. who cares. 'cause you're so scared. and you know i'm done
english.segment6: so long. guess it's so long. do you feel this now
english.segment7: all the times you said. you'd be better off if i were dead. you know you could have walked away. could have walked away
